name: Ninja Commando 2
description:
The object of the game is for your ninja to travel right through to the end of the level by jumping and running across the platforms and structures.

The ninja starts a level without a weapon and the only way to destroy other ninjas etc is by jumping on them.  Certain flying enemies cannot be destroyed this way.

Every few enemy destroys a weapon is left which can be picked up, starting with a ninja star, then grenade, flames and machine gun.  All human enemies can be destroyed with a weapon.

Enemie ninjas appear from openings and buildings.  Your ninja is destroyed when in contact with any enemy or when he falls to the abyss at the bottom of the screen. When destroyed your ninja returns to checkpoint and loses the weapons.

The ninja is not destroyed by enemies who have just appeared from an opening (they flash colour to indicate this).  Each level has a bonus timer, with bonus points added up at the end of a level.

Every 5000 points creates a new life that you can pick up.

Ninja Commando 2 is retro platformer with pixel graphics. The original game was created in 1989 for Sinclair ZX Spectum, Atari and Commodore.
